page.title: 19Wildlife, Wickhambreaux.
page.content: Our area is a very beautiful part of the countryside. There are many {rabbits, foxes, hedgehogs}and other different animals. All our lanes are bordered by a large variety of wild flowers. The banks are cut about twice every year. Down by Puxton Farm there is a large private lake. The lake is bordered by trees on two sides and by the River Stour. On the lake you can see pretty {yellow lilies.}Not far from the lake there is some uncultivated land with many flowers, including{pyramidal {orchids.}Near the lake we saw some {hogweed,}but we don't think it was the giant type, although it was very big. There are many footpaths in our area. It is easy to get away from the traffic, to observe birds, insects and other wildlife.
